dc-workflow.title: ProgramManagement
dc-workflow.description: - Simple workflow that is useful for basic web sites. - Things start out as private, and can either be submitted for review, or published directly. - The creator of a content item can edit the item even after it is published.

state.title: Pending Program Fee Determination by OIE
Request for Proposals under Liaison Review
Travel Expense Report & Student Evaluations Due to OIE

transition.title: Arrive-Non-sponsored Program
transition.description: TRIGGER=When MGMT PORTAL's "On-site Program Leader", "Program Leadership" = "no"; transition occurs on the 2nd date in MGMT PORTAL's "Travel Dates, Transitions & Destinations".

transition.title: Arrive-Sponsored Program
transition.description: TRIGGER=When MGMT PORTAL's "On-site Program Leader", "Program Leadership" = "no"; transition occurs on the 2nd date in MGMT PORTAL's "Travel Dates, Transitions & Destinations".

transition.title: Bill for Final Payment (groups with leader)
transition.action: Bill for Final Payment (groups with leader)

transition.title: Bill for Final Payment (programs with no leader)
transition.action: Bill for Final Payment (programs with no leader)

transition.title: Depart-Non-sponsored Program
transition.description: TRIGGER=When MGMT PORTAL's "Sponsoring Unit or Department" = "non-sponsored"; transition occurs on the 1st date in MGMT PORTAL's "Travel Dates, Transitions & Destinations".

transition.title: Depart-Sponsored Program
transition.description: TRIGGER=When MGMT PORTAL's "On-site Program Leader", "Program Leadership" = "no"; transition occurs on the 1st date in MGMT PORTAL's "Travel Dates, Transitions & Destinations".

transition.title: Returned-Non-sponsored Program
transition.description: TRIGGER=When MGMT PORTAL's "Sponsoring Unit or Department" = "non-sponsored"; transition occurs on the final date in MGMT PORTAL's "Travel Dates, Transitions & Destinations".

transition.title: Returned-Sponsored Program
transition.description: TRIGGER=When MGMT PORTAL's "On-site Program Leader", "Program Leadership" = "no"; transition occurs on the final date in MGMT PORTAL's "Travel Dates, Transitions & Destinations".

variable.description: The ID of the user who performed the previous transition
When the previous transition was performed
